title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon - Wikipedia
snippet: Jean-Luc Antoine Pierre Mélenchon (French: [ʒɑ̃lyk melɑ̃ʃɔ̃] ⓘ; born 19 August 1951) is a French politician who has been the de facto leader of the movement La France Insoumise (LFI) since it was established in 2016. He was the deputy in the National Assembly for the 4th constituency ...

title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon - World news, culture and opinion
snippet: Jean-Luc Mélenchon's party La France Insoumise will not be taking part in Sunday's demonstration in Paris, unlike its Socialist, Green, and Communist allies. Published on November 10, 2023, at 4:35 pm (Paris), updated on November 10, 2023, ...

title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon | The Guardian
snippet: Jean-Luc Mélenchon is leader of the leftwing party La France Insoumise

title: Jean-Luc Melenchon: Star of France's hard-left poses problem for election victors | Reuters
snippet: The towering firebrand of France's hard-left, Melenchon's France Unbowed (LFI) party won the most seats of the leftist alliance that scored a shock victory over the far right in Sunday's snap legislative election.
